pr_title: fix #2008 Add onErrorContinue support to FluxFlattenIterable

timeline.message:
Add error handling support to FluxFlattenIterable

As opposed to many other operators, the FluxFlattenIterable does not
support `onErrorContinue` handling.

Attempted to add that support in this PR, together with a test verifying
the behaviour.
Add more FluxFlattenIterable test scenarios and provide fixes

timeline.bodyText: nit: maybe replace the test name suffixes of Async with NotFused and Sync with Fused ?
timeline.author: simonbasle

replies.bodyText:
Sure. I thought the Async / sync was logical because of the drain method that would get called.
Will change.
replies.author: mdonkers

timeline.message: Rename test methods based on review comment
